casebody.data:
BROWN
v.
WENDOVER PLAZA LLC, et al. 53P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Terry L. Brown, for Brown, Terry L. Julie L. Bell, Attorney at Law, Winston Salem, for Wendover Plaza LLC, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of February 2019 by Defendant to Dismiss Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."
